entry.title: LED Bathroom Vanity Mirror With Lights 36" x 48" Inch, Defogger On/Off Touch Switch, CCT Changeable With Remembrance, Window Style
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Vanity Mirrors
Price: 738.38

Add an aesthetic by installing Front W36'' X H48'' LED vanity mirror of accord style to your dark, dingy bathroom and transform it into an inviting space. The clean and futuristic appearance of LED Bathroom Mirrors makes them ideal for contemporary interiors. This mirror is featured with an inbuilt Defogger, touch switch control, CCT remembrance, and waterproof features. This is the ETL-listed LED vanity mirror that provides you with a clear, crisp, and flawless reflection and comes with a five years manufacturer warranty.

Defogger is the special feature of the LED Vanity Mirror that helps to remove the fog that gets collected on the mirror. It saves time for manually cleaning the mirror. The Defogger is not controlled through the switch on the mirror. The switch only controls the LED Light on the mirror to turn on and off or to change CCT. If you wish to switch the defogger off, you will have to turn the switch off or take the plug off of the outlet. The temperature of the defogger will always be 59-68 degrees more than the room temperature. To elaborate, let’s say if your room temperature is 59 degrees Fahrenheit then the temperature of the defogger would be 86-95 degrees Fahrenheit.

entry.title: LED Lighted Bathroom Mirror 36" x 36" Inch, On/Off Touch Switch, CCT Changeable With Remembrance, Defogger, Window Style
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Vanity Mirrors
Price: 696.78

Upgrade your bathroom like a dressing room by installing an Inner window style 36" x36" sophisticated LED vanity mirror and start getting ready every day by feeling like a celebrity. This LED bathroom Mirror is having inbuilt Defogger, touch switch, CCT remembrance, and waterproof features. The Defogger enables the user to use it even after a hot bath or hot shower. This LED Vanity Mirror is lightly weighted, which makes a perfect addition to any space. Purchase this UL and ETL listed excellent mirror integrated pieces with ideal lighting with a warranty period of 5 years.

Defogger is the special feature of the LED Vanity Mirror that helps to remove the fog that gets collected on the mirror. It saves time for manually cleaning the mirror. The Defogger is not controlled through the switch on the mirror. The switch only controls the LED Light on the mirror to turn on and off or to change CCT. If you wish to switch the defogger off, you will have to turn the switch off or take the plug off of the outlet. The temperature of the defogger will always be 59-68 degrees more than the room temperature. To elaborate, let’s say if your room temperature is 59 degrees Fahrenheit then the temperature of the defogger would be 86-95 degrees Fahrenheit.
